warning_deprecated: We’ve made Peerio better! Please get the <a-download>latest version</> to sign in.
error_deprecated: Please get the <a-download>latest version</> to sign in.
title_signOutConfirmKeys: You’re about to lock the door to your Peerio account. You will need your account key when you return.
error_connecting: You seem to be offline. Trying to connect...
title_autologinSetFail: Unable to enable autologin, you will need your Account Key to sign in.
title_autologinDisableFail: Unable to disable autologin, you will be logged in automatically when Peerio Messenger starts.
title_enableAutomatic1: <i>Account Key</> is never required to sign in on this device. Sign out to disable.
title_enableAutomatic2: <i>Account Key</> is always required to sign in.
title_newUserWelcomeDescription:
Welcome to Peerio.
The best choice for private and secure collaboration.
title_nameHint: Letters, accents, spaces and dashes are allowed.
title_demoNamePurpose: Your name lets others know who you are. You can edit it later.
title_demoUsername: Hey <username>username</>, you can tag people like this in conversations to get their attention.
title_generatingAkDescription: You will use this to sign in to your account.
title_generatingAkExplanation:
Research shows that computers make stronger passwords than humans.

Fun fact: This account key will be so strong, 1,000,000 King Kongs on bicycle generators wouldn't create enough power to crack it.
title_akBackupDescription: <b>Important:</> Download this document, and store it somewhere safe to ensure you don't lose access to your account.
title_backupAkReminder: Save your Account Key. Peerio can’t reset your Account Key or unlock your account for you.
title_backupAkReminderMobile: Peerio can’t reset your Account Key or unlock your account for you.
title_termsDescription: The main points of our <openTerms>Terms of Use</> and <openPrivacy>Privacy policy</> are summed up below:
title_termsIntro: These terms set out the legal agreements you make when using the Peerio service. These are designed to protect both you and Peerio. You’ll need to read the full terms for full legal detail, but some of the main points are...
title_termsContentParagraph: You agree to not steal Peerio’s copyrighted and trademarked content. For our open source content, you agree to respect the open source licensing specified in our terms (GNU GPL v3). You recognize that as an encrypted service, Peerio cannot access user generated content — users are responsible for their own content.
title_termsBehaviourParagraph: You agree to not do anything illegal or abusive with the Peerio service. Peerio reserves the right to deny service to any user found to be committing crimes, abusing other users, or breaking the terms of service agreement.
title_termsSecurityParagraph: You recognize that Peerio has gone through great lengths to provide you with an extraordinarily strong security platform, but we won’t be held responsible for things beyond our control. You will be responsible for things like keeping your Account Key safe.
title_termsDataCollectionIntro: Peerio collects data required for the service to operate as intended and to provide you with the best possible user experience.
title_termsMetadataParagraph: End-to-end encryption means the content of all your messages and files is hidden from our servers in the form of “ciphertext”. Peerio collects this encrypted ciphertext and metadata such as timestamps and recipient information to store and deliver your encrypted messages and files.
title_termsAccountInfoParagraph: Peerio collects data you provide to setup your account, such as your name, username, and email address. If you choose to sync your address book or invite contacts, Peerio collects this information to deliver invites and connect you with your contacts.
title_termsIpParagraph: Peerio collects IP address information to connect you to our data centers. This can reveal location information. IP addresses can also help identify suspicious activity with your account or on the network to protect you and provide reliable service.
title_termsDataThirdParty: What data is handled by third parties?
title_termsServiceParagraph: Encrypted data, metadata, and operational data such as IP addresses are shared with our data hosts in order to provide the service. These data hosts cannot access the contents of your messages and files.
title_termsCommunicationsParagraph: Account information such as your name, email address, and contacts’ email addresses may be shared with our customer support service and mail delivery service. This is done to deliver email based notifications and communicate with you regarding your account.
title_termsAnalyticsParagraph: If you opt-in to send crash reports and anonymized usage data, data will be shared with our data analytics services to help improve your experience with Peerio. This data may also be shared with our customer support service in the event you seek support regarding an issue.
title_declineExplanation: Declining Peerio’s terms of use means you won’t have an account.
title_whyRequiredExplanation:
Our commitment and terms of service are intended to help everyone in Peerio better understand what to expect from us, and what we expect from them.
Learn more about our Privacy policy and Terms of Use.
title_signupAgain: If you want to sign up again.
title_signupAgainExplanation: If you change your mind, you can accept our terms of use  and finish signing up for an account on Peerio.
title_shareUsageDataDescription:
Sharing anonymous usage data and error reports helps improve Peerio and your experience with the app. This will never reveal any of your messages, files, or other private information to Peerio or anyone else.

You can change this setting at anytime by going to Settings > Privacy.
title_TOSRequestText: By creating a Peerio account, you agree to our <tosButton>terms of use.</>
title_AKwarn3: Peerio doesn’t use <i>passwords</> like other apps. This key protects all your info, <b>so keep it safe!</>
title_AKwarn4: <b>Save this now.</> You’re going to need it later.
title_saveNow3: We never store your key, so we can’t recover or reset your account for you.
title_saveNow4: If you lose this key you will lose all your Peerio contacts and files, and you’ll have to create a new account. Save it now!
title_findYourContactsDescription: See who's already on Peerio, or quickly invite your contacts who aren't here yet.
title_permissionContactsDescroption: Peerio would like to access your contact list. Peerio will only use this to connect you with your contacts on Peerio.
title_confirmEmailInvite: Send email invite(s) to your {numSelectedContacts} contact(s)
title_hintUsername: Letters, numbers, and underscores are allowed.
title_hintUsernameValid: Share this with your contacts so they can add you on Peerio.
title_hintEmail: Your email lets your contacts find you in Peerio.
title_AKlogin: Find your <b>Account Key</> in the <b>security settings</> of a device you've used before.
serverWarning_emailConfirmationSent: Check your email to confirm your address. Emails <b>MUST</> be confirmed for other users to find you.
serverWarning_emailNotConfirmed: Your email hasn't been confirmed. Go to your profile to resend the confirmation link.
serverWarning_scheduledDowntime: Peerio will be unavailable due to scheduled maintenance between {time1} and {time2}. Thank you for your understanding.
title_upgradeFileSystemDescription1: You can now share entire folders and perform bulk actions on your files, making collaboration and organization a snap.
title_upgradeFileSystemDescription2: We topped it off by improving security, fixing some minor bugs, and tweaking the UI to make things more intuitive.
title_upgradeFileSystemDescription3: Adding shared folders required updates to our file system. Files you have shared previously will be unshared. Before completing the update we want to give you an opportunity to <download>download</> a list of your shared files.
title_oldVersionDescription1: The file owner still needs to upgrade.
title_oldVersionDescription2: File actions are limited to <b>download</> and <b>delete</>.
title_oldVersionTooltip: Cannot be reshared until owner updates
title_fileUpdateProgressDescription: This dialog will close when the update is complete
error_usernameBadFormat: Only letters, numbers, and underscores are allowed.
error_usernameLengthExceeded: Usernames must not have more than 16 characters
error_usernameNotAvailable: This username is unavailable. Try a suggested one.

error_addressTaken: An account with this email exists. Try another.
error_signupServerError: Server error. Please try again later.
error_userNotFoundSendInvite: User not found. Send an invitation?

title_upgradeMessage: Upgrade to get additional storage and unlimited file upload size.
error_fileUploadSizeExceeded: The file you are trying to upload is too big.
serverWarning_Welcome: A paid plan has been registered to your account. You can view your plan benefits and learn <a-proWelcome>how to manage your account</>.
serverWarning_Cancelled: Your Peerio plan has been cancelled. Your paid benefits will expire on the end date of your plan and your plan will not be renewed.
serverWarning_Expire: Your Peerio paid plan will expire in 7 days. Please renew your plan to ensure your service is uninterrupted. If you do not renew and have stored more data than what is offered in Peerio's free service, you may experience limited functionality until your account is within its storage limit.
serverWarning_PaymentError: Your Peerio paid plan could not be renewed due to a problem with your payment method. Please review your <a-proAccount>account information</>.
serverWarning_QuotaExceeded: You're over your storage limit! Your account will have limited functionality until you purchase additional storage or remove some files from your account.

error_invalidFileSignatureLong: This file signature could not be verified. It is possible that the file was forged by a third party.

dialog_deleteSharedFolderNonOwnerText: You will no longer have access to any files in the folder.  Files owned by you will be deleted for everyone including you.

title_accountDeleteDescription3: Your acount will be locked for 24 hours starting immediately. Meanwhile, a confirmation email will be sent to your primary address. You must click the confirmation link in the email to delete the account fully.

title_roomInviteUpgradeNotice: Hi there. Basic Peerio accounts have access to <b>3 free rooms</>. Upgrade your account to get more, or decline this invite.

title_confirmChannelLeaveDescription: You will lose access to files you have received here and will need a new invitation to rejoin this.

button_2FAUsedCodes: You have used {used}/{limit} of backup codes
title_enterTOTPCodeFromApp: Input the 6 digit code from the app
title_verifyDeviceTwoWeeks: Verify this device for one month.
title_authAppsDetails: To enable Two Step Verification use an authenticator app such as Google Authenticator for <a-googleAuthA>Android</> or <a-googleAuthI>iOS</> or <a-authy>Authy</> on your desktop or mobile device, and follow the steps on the screen.
title_2FAEnabledThanks: Thanks for adding another layer of security to your account.
title_2FABackupDetail: If you can't access your second verification method, save these backup codes to avoid getting locked out of Peerio.
title_2FALoginAuthPreText: Input the verification code found in your authenticator app.
title_2FALoginAuthPostText: Trusted devices will be getting less 2fa requests on sign in to minimize inconvenience.
title_2FABackupCodeAuthPreText: Please input your verification code to generate new backup codes.
title_2FABackupCodeAuthPostText: Generating new backup codes will make your old codes invalid.
title_2FADisableAuthPreText: Please input your verification code to disable this option.
title_2FADisableAuthPostText: By disabling Two Step Verification, you are removing a layer of security from your account.

title_onboardingInstallMobileAppContent: Unlock 100 MB storage and access Peerio on the go.
title_welcomeSubHeading: Your private and secure collaboration platform
title_welcomePrivateContent: Peerio’s end-to-end encryption keeps your data safe from breaches.
title_welcomeSafeContent: Only you can access your account. Your data is safe and secure 24/7.
title_welcomeFastContent: So fast, you’ll forget that everything is always encrypted.

title_confirmContent1: Only you have a copy of your Account Key.
title_confirmContent2: If you lose it, we cannot help you access your account.
title_accountKey1: Passwords are way stronger when computers make them. This Account Key was generated just for you.
title_accountKey2: Since Peerio cannot access any of your data, including this Account Key, saving a backup may help you in the future.

description_shareInChat_beacon_mobile: Upload a new file or share a file you’ve already uploaded to Peerio here.
description_infoPanel_beacon_desktop: Toggle your infopanel to quickly access all files shared in this chat.
description_infoPanel_beacon_mobile: Tap to access your infopanel and quickly access all files shared in this chat.
description_pin_beacon: You can pin the contacts you chat with the most to keep them at the top of your list.
description_receivedFile_beacon: Files shared with you in direct messages appear here automatically.
description_moreFiles_beacon: Discover what you can do with files, tap here to view all options.
description_folders_beacon: Create folders and organize your files. Tip: You can create folders within folders.
title_contacts_zeroState0: Quickly and easily add your contacts
title_contacts_zeroState1: Add your contacts to start chatting and sharing files securely.
title_insecureImagePreviewWarning: Image is not displayed because the link is not secure (doesnʼt use https)
